description:
Sara teaches multiple girls about being princesses, multiple women are now vying for Sosuke`s hand in marriage (unbeknownst to him), and Livia tries multiple ways to make a living gambling.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Multiplying Princesses / Gambler Lady Knight / Friendship Between Girls (LOL)
Zoushoku Suru Warawa / Asobinin Onna Kishi / Onna no Yuujou (Warau)
増殖する妾[わらわ] / 遊び人女騎士 / 女の友情 (笑)
